snippet: Even as West, Tex., is beginning to rise a month after a fertilizer plant exploded, some people are asking at what cost.
abstract: Residents of West, Tex, large sections of which were devastated in April fertilizer plant explosion, are weighing whether to rebuild and move back into ruined areas or abandon them; at issue is cost of rebuilding in town where money is scarce.
lead_paragraph: Even as West, Tex., is beginning to rise a month after a fertilizer plant exploded, some people are asking at what cost.

headline.seo: After Explosion, Texas Town Ponders Future
headline.main: After Devastating Blast, Questions in a Texas Town Over Whether to Rebuild or Move On
headline.print_headline: After Devastating Blast, Questions in a Texas Town Over Whether to Rebuild or Move On
